title: Sri Lanka schedules 2 hours 30 minutes for June 20, June 21
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka will impose power cuts of up to 2 hours and 30 minutes on June 20 and 21, starting from 12noon, to help online education, Public Utilities Commission (PUCSL) Chairman Janaka Ratnayake said.
Power cuts will be imposed on the following areas in blocks of 30 minutes and 2 hours.
Download the feeder list from the annexure at the end of the schedule at this link.
